title: Lawmaker Confronts Sister of Alaa Abd El Fattah, Jailed Egyptian Activist, at COP27
description: A prison hunger strike by the dissident, Alaa Abd El Fattah, has overshadowed the climate summit in Egypt.
dc:creator: Vivian Yee and Nick Cumming-Bruce
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
media:description: Sanaa Seif, the sister of Alaa Abd El Fattah, an Egyptian dissident whose hunger strike in prison has overshadowed the beginnings of the summit, in Sharm el Sheikh, Egypt, on Tuesday.
